title: Full-Stack Developer
//_comment: HERO: Focuses on potential, growth, and enthusiasm.
summary: Aspiring Full-Stack Developer with a solid foundation in the Microsoft Stack. I am passionate about learning best practices in C# and .NET, eager to tackle new challenges, and committed to growing as a professional developer within a collaborative team.
//_comment: ABOUT: Focuses on the academic journey and transferable soft skills.
bio: I am currently completing my diploma in IT Software Development at NBCC, where I have dedicated myself to mastering the fundamentals of web development. My academic projects have given me hands-on experience with the full software lifecycle, from database design to front-end implementation.

Before transitioning into tech, I gained valuable experience in team leadership and operations. These roles taught me the importance of clear communication, adaptability, and reliability qualities. I am excited to bring to a development team as I continue to learn and evolve in this field.
